entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -5.7°C

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
